description: This file defines a REST controller called UserController that manages user-related operations such as registration, update, and retrieval in a banking system. It uses Spring annotations to expose API endpoints and interacts with UserService for business logic.

classes.name: UserController
classes.description: A REST controller managing user registration, updates, and retrieval operations in the banking system.

methods.name: createUser
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests to register a new user in the system.

methods.name: updateUser
methods.description: Handles HTTP PATCH requests to update existing user details by ID.

methods.name: readUsers
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve a paginated list of users.

methods.name: readUser
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve a user by ID.
